title: Free type gift!
content:
A PDF with lots of qwirky type experiments: [http://www.manystuff.org/?page\_id=187](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011014029/http:/www.manystuff.org/?page_id=187 "http://www.manystuff.org/?page\_id=187")

The few interesting designer insights are a bonus.
author: writingdesigning

comments.content: Start now and yule have it downloaded by new year.

Thanks, Arun. It didn't take long to download.

Sharon
aluminum: Everyone loved big boxes as a kid at christmas, free PDFs for christmas should work the same way!

yea, I'm sorry for sounding ungrateful! Ok, it's 79 page of big pictures...fair enough!  
Thanks for sharing, writingdesigning!
Thanks Arun. Good to read others' thought processes, and to see the great sense of materials represented.
